title: Kamala Harris Wins Support Within Democractic Party To Face Donald Trump
content: Kamala Harris' remarks came two days after Joe Biden, who was seeking a rematch against Donald Trump, announced to bow down.
summary: Kamala Harris' remarks came two days after Joe Biden, who was seeking a rematch against Donald Trump, announced to bow down.

title: Elon Musk Claims Transgender Daughter Is "Dead, Killed By Woke Mind Virus"
content: Tesla and SpaceX chief Elon Musk, in an interview with American conservative commentator Jordan Peterson, alleged that his estranged transgender daughter, Vivian Jenna Wilson, was "killed" by what he termed the "woke mind virus".
summary: Tesla and SpaceX chief Elon Musk, in an interview with American conservative commentator Jordan Peterson, alleged that his estranged transgender daughter, Vivian Jenna Wilson, was "killed" by what he termed the "woke mind virus".

title: South Korea Theme Park's Novel Bid To Fix Youth Unemployment
content: At a kids' role-playing theme park in Seoul, 23-year-old Park Woo-joo is on a very adult mission: the university-educated but unemployed South Korean is searching for his future career.
summary: At a kids' role-playing theme park in Seoul, 23-year-old Park Woo-joo is on a very adult mission: the university-educated but unemployed South Korean is searching for his future career.

title: Trump's Presidential Campaign Takes A Dig At Joe Biden, Kamala Harris
content: A day after US President Joe Biden opted out of the presidential race, Donald Trump's campaign said it was a "once-in-a-lifetime" opportunity to "defeat not just one Democrat nominee for president, but two in the same year.
summary: A day after US President Joe Biden opted out of the presidential race, Donald Trump's campaign said it was a "once-in-a-lifetime" opportunity to "defeat not just one Democrat nominee for president, but two in the same year.

title: Secret Service Chief's "Most Serious Lapse" Admission Over Trump Shooting
content: The failed assassination bid on former US President Donald Trump is the "most serious" security lapse since the then President Ronald Regan was shot in 1981, the head of the US Secret Service conceded to lawmakers on Monday.
summary: The failed assassination bid on former US President Donald Trump is the "most serious" security lapse since the then President Ronald Regan was shot in 1981, the head of the US Secret Service conceded to lawmakers on Monday.

title: Hindu Temple Defaced With Anti-India Grafitti In Canada
content: A Hindu temple in Canada's Edmonton was defaced with anti-India graffiti on Monday. The BAPS Swaminarayan Temple was targetted early this morning, the Hindu American Foundation said, adding that the slurs used in the grafitti attacked MP Chandra Arya
summary: A Hindu temple in Canada's Edmonton was defaced with anti-India graffiti on Monday. The BAPS Swaminarayan Temple was targetted early this morning, the Hindu American Foundation said, adding that the slurs used in the grafitti attacked MP Chandra Arya

title: "Cocaine Sharks" Found In Brazil, Scientist Unsure Where They Get The Drug
content: Sharks off the coast of Brazil have cocaine in them and scientists believe the drug may be altering their behaviour. In a study conducted on 13 Brazilian sharpnose sharks from waters near Rio de Janeiro, marine biologists found high levels of cocaine
summary: Sharks off the coast of Brazil have cocaine in them and scientists believe the drug may be altering their behaviour. In a study conducted on 13 Brazilian sharpnose sharks from waters near Rio de Janeiro, marine biologists found high levels of cocaine

title: Kamala Harris Draws On Prosecutorial Skills Against Trump In Election Bid
content: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris, building Democratic backing for her sudden presidential run, rallied supporters on Monday with a debut campaign speech vowing to go after Republican nominee Donald Trump like the courtroom prosecutor she once was.
summary: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris, building Democratic backing for her sudden presidential run, rallied supporters on Monday with a debut campaign speech vowing to go after Republican nominee Donald Trump like the courtroom prosecutor she once was.

title: Google Scraps Plan To Remove Cookies From Chrome
content: Google is planning to keep third-party cookies in its Chrome browser, it said on Monday, after years of pledging to phase out the tiny packets of code meant to track users on the internet.
summary: Google is planning to keep third-party cookies in its Chrome browser, it said on Monday, after years of pledging to phase out the tiny packets of code meant to track users on the internet.

title: Kamala Harris' Campaign Raises $81 Million Since Biden Steps Aside
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign has raised USD 81 million in the first 24-hour period since incumbent President Joe Biden stepped aside from the presidential race and endorsed his deputy as the Democratic Party's new nominee.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign has raised USD 81 million in the first 24-hour period since incumbent President Joe Biden stepped aside from the presidential race and endorsed his deputy as the Democratic Party's new nominee.

title: Dozens Killed As Israel Announces Evacuation Order In South Gaza
content: The health ministry in Hamas-run Gaza said Monday that an Israeli operation in Khan Yunis killed 70 people and wounded more than 200, after the military warned it would "forcefully operate" in the area.
summary: The health ministry in Hamas-run Gaza said Monday that an Israeli operation in Khan Yunis killed 70 people and wounded more than 200, after the military warned it would "forcefully operate" in the area.

title: "I Know Trump's Type", Says Kamala Harris As She Launches Election Campaign
content: Vice President Kamala Harris on Monday compared her election rival Donald Trump to "predators" and "cheaters," as she attacked the first former US leader to be convicted of a crime.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris on Monday compared her election rival Donald Trump to "predators" and "cheaters," as she attacked the first former US leader to be convicted of a crime.

title: "She Is The Best": Biden Urges Democrats To Embrace Kamala Harris
content: US President Joe Biden urged his supporters on Monday to embrace Vice President Kamala Harris, saying his decision to drop out of the White House race was the "right thing" to have done.
summary: US President Joe Biden urged his supporters on Monday to embrace Vice President Kamala Harris, saying his decision to drop out of the White House race was the "right thing" to have done.

title: Who Will Kamala Harris Pick As Her Running Mate?
content: Vice President Kamala Harris has quickly risen as the Democratic Party's likely presidential candidate since Joe Biden dropped out of the race Sunday and endorsed her, buoyed by support from other leading party figures as well.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris has quickly risen as the Democratic Party's likely presidential candidate since Joe Biden dropped out of the race Sunday and endorsed her, buoyed by support from other leading party figures as well.

title: 4.7 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Turkey
content: A 4.7-magnitude earthquake has jolted Turkey's northwestern province of Canakkale, according to the Disaster and Emergency Management Presidency (AFAD).
summary: A 4.7-magnitude earthquake has jolted Turkey's northwestern province of Canakkale, according to the Disaster and Emergency Management Presidency (AFAD).

title: Bangladesh PM's Office, Police Websites Hacked Amid Unrest Over Job Quota
content: Amid the unrest in Bangladesh, the official websites of Bangladesh's Prime Minister's Office, Central Bank and police appeared to have been hacked by a group calling itself "THE R3SISTANC3".
summary: Amid the unrest in Bangladesh, the official websites of Bangladesh's Prime Minister's Office, Central Bank and police appeared to have been hacked by a group calling itself "THE R3SISTANC3".

title: Internet Says Kamala Harris Is "Brat", And Her Campaign Is Embracing It
content: Kamala Harris is not yet the Democratic Party's candidate for president but her status online is already clear: she is a meme.
summary: Kamala Harris is not yet the Democratic Party's candidate for president but her status online is already clear: she is a meme.

title: "I Have Full Confidence...": Nancy Pelosi Endorses Kamala Harris
content: Former speaker of the US House of Representatives and leading Democratic Party figure Nancy Pelosi announced on Monday that she was backing Kamala Harris to replace President Joe Biden in the November election.
summary: Former speaker of the US House of Representatives and leading Democratic Party figure Nancy Pelosi announced on Monday that she was backing Kamala Harris to replace President Joe Biden in the November election.

title: Trump Says Nobody Warned Him Of "A Problem" Before Assassination Attempt
content: Donald Trump said on Saturday nobody warned him of a problem in the lead-up to the former president's rally in Pennsylvania when a would-be assassin shot him in the ear.
summary: Donald Trump said on Saturday nobody warned him of a problem in the lead-up to the former president's rally in Pennsylvania when a would-be assassin shot him in the ear.

title: "Not A Single Well Remains": Gazans Scour Ruins For Water
content: To get his family the water they need for drinking, bathing and laundry, Ahmed al-Shanbari steels himself for a lengthy search through the north of the Gaza Strip.
summary: To get his family the water they need for drinking, bathing and laundry, Ahmed al-Shanbari steels himself for a lengthy search through the north of the Gaza Strip.
